text: Europe is an American-Swedish rock band. It was started by Joey Tempest and John Norum in 1979. Their song "The Final Countdown" was a big hit in 1986. Europe took a break in 1992, but came back in 2003. ==Albums== *Force (1982) *Europe (1983) *Wings of Tomorrow (1984) *The Final Countdown (1986) *Out of This World (1988) *Prisoners in Paradise (1991) *Start from the Dark (2004) *Secret Society (2006) *Last Look at Eden (2009) *Bag of Bones (2012) *War of Kings (2015) *Walk the Earth (2017) == References == == Other websites == * Europe's Official Site * Europe's official Facebook page Category:1970s Swedish music groups Category:1980s Swedish music groups Category:1990s Swedish music groups Category:2000s Swedish music groups Category:2010s Swedish music groups Category:Hard rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1979 Category:Swedish heavy metal bands Category:1979 establishments in Sweden Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1992 Category:1990s disestablishments in Sweden Category:1992 disestablishments in Europe
title: Europe (band)
